capsules_submitted.utterance: So Hagrid's hobbies are pretty well-known, and I can confirm that he loves his pets. He's always been quite the animal enthusiast, especially when it comes to magical creatures.

You know, I've always been fascinated by Hagrid's love for his pets. He's got a special bond with them, and it's really endearing to see him care for them so much. I mean, who wouldn't want a Hippogriff as a pet? It's like he's found a way to connect with these magical creatures in a way that others can't. And his fondness for Care of Magical Creatures is just one aspect of what makes Hagrid such an amazing character.
